entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
